title: A Survey of Large Language Models for Code Generation

sections.description: Introduce the topic of large language models (LLMs) for code generation, highlighting their significance in AI-driven code creation. Discuss the motivation for the survey, the importance of understanding LLMs in this context, and the objectives of the paper.
